Anyone have the panel cutout dimensions for this guy?

Powerwerx

Powerwerx PanelPlateSB1 for Anderson SB50 Series Connectors

Anderson Power SB50 Series Connector flush mounting to your dashboard, panel or chassis. Ideal for fixed mounted application for Anderson Power SB50 series connectors. Includes (1) Gray SB50 housing, (2) #8 gauge contacts, mounting plate and...

I tried contacting Powerwerx and they said they did not have any dimensional drawings available.
